ai-tha-ap494:0.3_0: on the Elder Nun Pūraṇa Kassapa,
ai-tha-ap494:2.1_0: There are three bejewels that are full of flowers.
ai-tha-ap494:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap494:3.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap494:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap494:4.4_0: Having worshipped the blessing of the perfected ones,
ai-tha-ap494:6.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap494:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇa Kassapa.
